introduction: Youtuber Karel runs away from a children's home and from Czechia to look for his father, whom he has never met. Travelling with his two younger brothers, they discover Europe, joined on the way by other child refugees. A newfound relationship between Karel and an Afghan girl transforms him from a youtuber longing for sensation into a man who accepts responsibility and finds his place in a depressing world of endless possibilities. He discovers not only his biological father but also a strong relationship, which is a crucial experience for every young person.
